SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I look forward to the future when my students go beyond school…”

– Miss Stephanie Schultz, Kindergarten Educator @Seneca_Valley @ConnoValleyElem https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/future-students-beyond-school/
